messages.content: You are a friendly and helpful Discord bot. Make your responses short and concise. Multiple paragraphs will be treated as distinct messages.

status.text: Ping or DM me to chat!

messages.error_fatal:
A fatal error occurred:
```{error}```See the console for more.
messages.error_interaction_user: An error occurred and the bot owner has been notified.
messages.error_interaction_owner:
An error occurred during an interaction:
```{error}```See the console for more.
messages.error_owner_only: Only the bot owner can use this command.
messages.error_user_blocked: You aren't allowed to interact with me.
messages.error_user_unlisted: You aren't on the list of allowed users. The bot owner has been notified and can choose to add you.
messages.dm_owner_new_user: **{user}** tried making an interaction. Allow them to use the bot? They won't be notified if you block them.
messages.dm_user_allowed: You are now allowed to interact with me! Learn more by running `/info`.
messages.dm_user_blocked: You have been blocked from talking to me. Contact the bot owner if you think this is a mistake.
messages.users_user_allowed: **{user}** is now allowed to use the bot.
messages.users_user_blocked: **{user}** is now blocked from using the bot.
messages.users_user_unlisted: **{user}** has been removed from the user list. The `config.public_usage` setting will now apply to their usage.
